title: How to write a mail to client asking about current order status - Quora

response.answer_text: Subject : In order to know the status of my order [here you mention your order ID] Body: Hello Team, Recently, I ordered a [mention what item you ordered] from [write name of your client] on [write the date when you ordered the item]. I was being apprised that the item will be delivered to me by [mention the expected time of delivery]. However, I haven’t received my item so far. I, therefore, would request you to provide me the status of my order. Also, I would like to know, when can I expect my item to be delivered to me. I would like you to escalate my request to the higher priority. Looking forward for a quick reply. Thanks, [Your Name] [Order ID]

Purchase Order Follow up. Dear Team, Greetings from XYZ company, we refer to quotation sent on ….. for the above mentioned Subject .. Its been more than 10days we didn’t hear anything from http://yourside.It will be really appreciated if you can update on the status of Purchase Order which were supposed to get in last week. As there is an hike in the prices so keeping the old rates will be quite difficult for us. Hopefully you have gone through all the information (BOQ, Technical Parameters,)provided by us. for any type of clarification and support please feel free to reach to us.
